description_top: Summary by Thābit ibn Qurrah of Galen’s treatise On Withering (Jawāmiʿ  Thābit ibn Qurrah min kitāb Jālīnūs fī al-dhubūl)
catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: Summary by Thābit ibn Qurrah of Galen’s treatise On Withering (Jawāmiʿ  Thābit ibn Qurrah min kitāb Jālīnūs fī al-dhubūl)
author: Thābit ibn Qurrah (d. 901)
description: The copy is undated and unsigned, but the general appearance of the paper (which has been severely water-damaged), the ink, and the script suggests a date of the 14th century. This is the ending of the manuscript.
